entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain or drizzle. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Fog patches dissipating late this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
